title: Rune Pages and Ultimate Skin Sales???
body: Hi! I don't know if this thread belongs under this section. I've been playing League for under a few month already. I've invested a some of money on Champion Sales (to understand each of  them). I don't mind spending money on this game. I was wondering if there will be a  2 for 1 Rune page sale any time soon as I would like to have all 20 pages unlock and if Ultimate skins do ever go on sale?

replies.body: 1820+ rp skins don't go on sale.
ulti's never go on sale, but they can come from mystery gifts. And rune pages usually around Easter and christmas
